description: You go to a park with your pet.
You take your pet to an ice-cream shop and share an ice-cream boat.
You look at the sunset with your pet.
You draw your pet, they love it.
Your pet and you play some World of Peacecraft.
You form a rock band with your pet.
Your pet and you play some Dota 4.
You listen to some music with your pet.
You play craftmine with your pet, they grief you a **lot**.
You take your pet to the cinema, the movie's really good.
Your pet and you take lots of selfies next to a river.
You take tens of photographs of your pet sleeping on your lap.
You watch some anime with your pet.
